page.title: 18THE MITCHELL FAMILY
page.content: Ben and Vera Mitchell,daughter Linda & son David live on the Froxfield Plateau.Ben's father & grandfather lived and worked in Petersfield before him.They used to grow strawberries.Now Ben's a fencing contractor,which takes him as far afield as the west country. He uses mainly local timber though the main demand nowadays is barbed wire fencing. David is a farm machinery mechanic and works locally. Linda is still at school though hopes to gain at least 6 O levels next year. She is doing Business Studies and Parenthood, as well as English,Maths & other subjects.She's a keen horsewoman and Pony Club member with many prizes to her name,& has competed in the Prince Philip Cup and hopes to make a career in the equestrian world.She has three ponies, and theres's no longer any room in the fields for strawberries!
